name: Color Painter
description:
Color Painter is my first game ever. 

It's really short as it is my first game but i really love it and hope some will love it too.

Find and use color to progress in the levels and discover little by little the story.

Jump : Spacebar
Move : right and left arrows
Talk to villagers : E
Pause : P
Collect Paint : R
Clear active colors : Numpad 6
Red : Numpad 1
Yellow : Numpad 2
Blue : Numpad 3
White : Numpad 4
Black : Numpad 5

Game entirely made by Lisa Buffo

Soundtrack by Maxime Kevers ft. Lisa Buffo
